sources.title: Shout For Joy
sources.description: The story of champion surfer Rick Irons (Michael Cummings).

metadata.Plot: Rick Irons (Robert Pierce) moves to Hawaii to live in paradise; surf the gigantic waves. At a party, Rick meets Alma (Maureen McCormick) who quickly becomes a love interest. While dating Alma, he begins to train for the United States surfing title. As Rick's life is racing to the top on the outside, he personally feels like the bottom is falling out on the inside.
metadata.Actors: Robert Pierce, Maureen McCormick, Michael Cummings
